entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
